synopsis.text:
When a brave, adventurous mouse named Gamba sets sail on a thrilling journey to explore the vast ocean, he encounters a distressed, wounded mouse named Chūta. Chūta shares a desperate plea for help, revealing the plight of his fellow mice on the enchanting island of Yumemishima, who are suffering under the ironclaw tyranny of the vicious Noroi Clan, led by a menacing white ferret.

Moved by Chūta's tale, Gamba assembles a valiant crew of experienced mice sailors, rallying them to join the cause and defend the innocent islanders from their cruel oppressors. United by courage and determination, Gamba and his growing band of heroes embark on a daring mission to restore peace and freedom to the once-harmonious Yumemishima.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
